## Introduction
This is my first *Qaurto* document and I am going to plot some penguin data.

```{r}
#| message: false

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

## Look at the data

```{r}
summary(penguins)
```

## Make a plot
This is looking at the relationship **bill length** versus **bill depth**.

```{r}
penguins   #penguins dataset
  ggplot2::aes(x= bill_len, y=bill_dep, color=species)+
  geom_point()
```
